snippet: Recognizing that its name — International Delight — is a mouthful, a brand decides to highlight individuality by promoting itself by its initials: ID.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column highlights campaign for WhiteWave Foods' nondairy flavored creamer International Delight.
lead_paragraph: Recognizing that its name — International Delight — is a mouthful, a brand decides to highlight individuality by promoting itself by its initials: ID.

headline.main: Coffee Creamer Brand Focuses on Simplicity and Identity
headline.print_headline: Coffee Creamer Brand Focuses on Simplicity and Identity
